item.description:
Hello, everybody, seems nobody really seriously wannt learn japanese KANJI. ^^

Until today, I am only got feedbacks from 2 persons.

1.here is the topics what Lynette Martyn suggested.

travel in the US/Japan
American/Japanese holidays
my most embarassing cultural mishap
etiquette/manners in your country
what does Autumn mean in America/Japan
pronunication, accent reduction
what Japanese / American food do you find to be strange?
pub/izakaya culture - tell a story from your culture
travel in the US/Japan
American/Japanese holidays
my most embarassing cultural mishap
etiquette/manners in your country
what does Autumn mean in America/Japan
pronunication, accent reduction
what Japanese / American food do you find to be strange?
pub/izakaya culture - tell a story from your culture

2. Tamani also said Basically she can lead a class like thing with other Japanese' help using her books of Japanese culture if people are interested.

So I think I will leave these topics as option until we start meetup. And will pick up
One or two, depending on how many people participate in this time.


Time schedule:

6:00 PM - 6:30 PM open networking between members
6:30 PM - 6:45 PM meeting called to order and individual introduction to group.
6:45 PM - 7:45 PM free topic discussion
7:45 PM - 8:00 PM more networking!

Fee will use to buy some snacks or tea.
item.name: Prudential Needham Networking & Culture Learning meetup
